description:
The Norrøna Cargo Shorts are fully functional hiking shorts in a classic cargo design with a Norrøna twist – perfect for relaxing and adventurous days outdoors.They are versatile and timeless, and a given part of any outdoor wardrobe.

The shorts have a casual fit and style: over the knee cut, side pockets that accommodate a trail map, and front and back pockets. Whether you’re heading for long hikes, down days, or exploring the world, these will deliver the optimal mix of outdoor function and design.
name: Norrona Norrona Cargo Shorts - Mens
